author: Sher Muhammad
title: Skardu, Gilgit-Baltistan weather update today
text:
Skardu, nestled amid the breathtaking landscapes of northern Pakistan, is currently draped in a picturesque winter scenario, offering residents and visitors alike a magical blend of cold temperatures and pristine air quality. The temperature in Skardu stands at a chilly 3°C, with a RealFeel® of 7°, under partly sunny skies.
One of the remarkable aspects of Skardu’s current weather is the excellent air quality, as reflected by an Air Quality Index (AQI) reading of 17. The air quality is deemed ideal for most individuals, allowing them to enjoy their normal outdoor activities without concerns about pollution. This presents a unique opportunity for locals and tourists to relish the crisp mountain air and engage in winter activities.
However, amidst the pristine air, Skardu is not immune to winter’s embrace. The city anticipates a dusting of snow today, with Wintercast projections indicating 1-3 cm of snowfall on Tuesday evening into Wednesday morning. Residents can expect a transformation of the landscape into a winter wonderland, adding to the enchantment of Skardu’s natural beauty.
The current pollutant levels reveal that dust and dander are very high, emphasizing the importance of precautions for those sensitive to such particles. Individuals with arthritis may experience moderate discomfort, and running conditions are rated as fair, urging caution for those engaging in outdoor activities. Lawn mowing conditions are poor, reflecting the challenges posed by the snowy terrain.
On the positive side, air travel conditions are great, offering ease for those with travel plans. Indoor pests, however, are reported as very high, prompting residents to take necessary precautions to maintain indoor air quality.
Looking ahead, the weather forecast for Skardu on January 13th projects a daytime high of 4°C with a RealFeel® of 8°, as snow graces the morning, accumulating 2-4 cm. As night falls, temperatures are expected to drop to -5°C with a RealFeel® of -3° under mostly cloudy skies.
Tomorrow’s forecast anticipates a temperature range of 3°C to -7°C, with sunshine and patchy clouds, promising another day of embracing the winter charm of Skardu.
